definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: At West Ham he was thought of as the rosebud that never properly flowered.
sentences.chinese: 在西汉姆他被认为是一个尚未开放的花蕾。

sentences.english: I make you bloom like a flower that you've never seen.
sentences.chinese: 我让你盛放得像一朵你从未见过的花蕾。

sentences.english: This material is the rose bud tea, three money, bergamot three money.
sentences.chinese: 此茶用料是玫瑰花蕾三钱，佛手三钱。

sentences.english: No, I guess Rosebud is just a… piece in a jigsaw puzzle… a missing piece.
sentences.chinese: 我猜，玫瑰花蕾也许就是拼图上的一块，遗失的一块。

sentences.english: Chrysanthemum indicum L. was used as the raw material to extract antioxidant materials by microwave technology.
sentences.chinese: 以野菊花花蕾为材料，研究其提取物的抗氧化活性。

sentences.english: A belt straw and ivy buds.
sentences.chinese: 麦草和长春藤花蕾编的腰带。

sentences.english: These naughty kids have pulled off all the rose buds.
sentences.chinese: 这些淘气的孩子把所有玫瑰花蕾都摘掉了。

sentences.english: Seize the day. Gather ye rosebuds while ye may. Why does the writer use these lines?
sentences.chinese: “及时采拮你的花蕾”，为什么作者要写这几句话？

sentences.english: The flowers bud will weather the attacks from cold wind and rain, making it way blossom into the fair spring.
sentences.chinese: 让含苞的花蕾经受住寒风冷雨，绽放在明媚的春天。
这些蔷薇花蕾还没有完全开放。

sentences.english: There were red bursting flower buds hanging on the fresh apple tree branches.
sentences.chinese: 在苹果树新的枝头挂满了红色的含苞待放的花蕾。

sentences.english: People often said his skin were like flower buds, white sand silky.
sentences.chinese: 人们常常说，他地皮肤像花蕾，白沙滩柔滑。

sentences.english: The rose buds are unfolding into flowers.
Bound to wither in the rebirth, bud growth, quiet fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 必将在枯萎中重生，花蕾的成长，清幽的芬芳。

sentences.english: For a refreshing twist try making “Rosebud Ice Cubes.”
sentences.chinese: 一个令人耳目一新的尝试是做“玫瑰花蕾冰块”。

sentences.english: The flower buds of the palm collect yeast, which ferments the nectar, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他们表示，棕榈树的花蕾聚集了使花蜜发酵的酵母。

definition: (of a plant) to be in bud
to bloom/to blossom/to flower/fig. to burst open/to feel happy or elated/new development grows out
axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
